ygData.subject: Really?
ygData.msgSnippet: I was recently told by my good friend Kaylin Danmor that Green Splinted Armor no longer existed. I don t mean to argue the point, but I want to make sure
ygData.messageBody:
I was recently told by my good friend Kaylin
Danmor that Green Splinted Armor no longer existed. I
don't mean to argue the point, but I want to make sure
because I always dreamed of marching around in a suit of
green plate in a Ranger fashion. If anyone knows
whether this rare armor exists at all or if it is simply
near impossible to find, please let me know. If Green
Splinted does not exist, then is there any other armor
that shows up as green plate that a ranger can
wear?<br><br>Trellan Hawksight, Wood Elf Ranger of 20 seasons.
